results.title: Case Report of High-Grade Atrioventricular Block and Takotsubo Cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: Therefore, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was diagnosed with @DISEASE_Takotsubo_Cardiomyopathy @DISEASE_MESH:D054549 @@@TTC@@@ and 2:1 @<m>DISEASE_Atrioventricular_Block</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054537 @@@AVB@@@. She was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol succinate@@@ and received a dual-chamber pacemaker.

citations.NLM: Prasad R, Salam MF, Srivastava S, Samreen F, Baloch ZQ. Case Report of High-Grade Atrioventricular Block and Takotsubo Cardiomyopathy. Perm J. 2021 May 12;25():. PMID: 35348088
citations.BibTeX: @article{35348088, title={Case Report of High-Grade Atrioventricular Block and Takotsubo Cardiomyopathy.}, author={Prasad R and Salam MF and Srivastava S and Samreen F and Baloch ZQ}, journal={Perm J}, volume={25}}

results.title: Effect of the Antihypertensive and Lipid-Lowering Treatment to Prevent Heart Attack Trial (ALLHAT) on Conduction System Disease.
authors: Antihypertensive and Lipid-Lowering Treatment to Prevent Heart Attack Trial (ALLHAT) Collaborative Research Group
results.text_hl: Compared with @CHEMICAL_Chlorthalidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002752 @@@chlorthalidone@@@, randomization to @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ was associated with a significant 19% reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Atrioventricular_Block</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054537 @@@conduction abnormalities@@@ (hazard ratio [HR], 0.81; 95% CI, 0.69-0.95; P = .01).

citations.NLM: Dewland TA, Soliman EZ, Davis BR, Magnani JW, Yamal JM, Piller LB, Haywood LJ, Alonso A, Albert CM, Marcus GM, Antihypertensive and Lipid-Lowering Treatment to Prevent Heart Attack Trial (ALLHAT) Collaborative Research Group. Effect of the Antihypertensive and Lipid-Lowering Treatment to Prevent Heart Attack Trial (ALLHAT) on Conduction System Disease. JAMA Intern Med. 2016 Aug 1;176(8):1085-92. PMID: 27367818
citations.BibTeX: @article{27367818, title={Effect of the Antihypertensive and Lipid-Lowering Treatment to Prevent Heart Attack Trial (ALLHAT) on Conduction System Disease.}, author={Dewland TA and Soliman EZ and Davis BR and Magnani JW and Yamal JM and Piller LB and Haywood LJ and Alonso A and Albert CM and Marcus GM and Antihypertensive and Lipid-Lowering Treatment to Prevent Heart Attack Trial (ALLHAT) Collaborative Research Group}, journal={JAMA Intern Med}, volume={176}, number={8}, pages={1085-92}}

results.title: Acute Ascending Muscle Weakness Secondary to Medication-Induced Hyperkalemia
results.text_hl: Electrocardiogram showed first-degree @<m>DISEASE_Atrioventricular_Block</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054537 @@@atrioventricular block@@@ with peaked T waves.

citations.NLM: Kimmons LA, Usery JB. Acute Ascending Muscle Weakness Secondary to Medication-Induced Hyperkalemia Case Rep Med. 2014;2014():789529. PMID: 24782897
citations.BibTeX: @article{24782897, title={Acute Ascending Muscle Weakness Secondary to Medication-Induced Hyperkalemia}, author={Kimmons LA and Usery JB}, journal={Case Rep Med}, volume={2014}, pages={789529}}
